DOC.criteria: Overtly healthy sterile male surgically sterile female postmenopausal female Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kilogram per meter square ( kg/m^2 ) Have participate clinical trial involve investigational product within last 30 day Have abnormality 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , opinion investigator , increase risk associate participate study Have abnormal blood pressure Show evidence human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B hepatitis C Have donate blood 500 milliliter ( mL ) within last month Have use intend use overthecounter prescription medication include herbal medication within 7 day prior dose study
